item.title: Welcome to my Blog
item.description: Hello everyone, Welcome to my blog! Why GitHub Pages? Github page is offering free online static page. Starting a static page in github maybe is a easier way for individuals who prefer not to rely on existing online blog platforms. Unlike holding a website server on AWS which can be costly and vulnerable to random attacks from online sources, GitHub Pages provides a user-friendly solution for those who simply want to manage a blog without the complexities of traditional web hosting.

item.title: Create Personal Page
item.description: Why Create Personal Page In the past, I used to maintain a server on AWS, essentially transforming it into my own personalized cloud drive and a platform for writing blogs. However, this setup incurred expenses and proved to be quite challenging to utilize effectively as a blog publishing platform. It felt akin to having a computer online, complete with virtual machines and various tools like lambda. Over time, as AWS

item.title: About Me
item.description: This blog is to record the learning notes ~ Is Me Highly skilled and motivated Embedded Firmware and Software Engineer in the full software development life cycle for IoT and real-time control applications. Proficient in C/C++, Python, Jira, Git, SVN and microcontroller development with a proven track record of delivering software functionalities on time, within budget, and maintaining high quality standards. Adept at debugging, troubleshooting, problem-solving, and technical documentation while working efficiently under pressure in fast-paced environments.
